name: 張元震
objective:
讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等，可重覆修習。
Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.
scorePolicy: Policy would be announced in the 1st class.
materials: Materials would be provided by lectures every week.
consultation: Please contact TA or Lecturer by Email
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）
